amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Indian Health Services by $4.4 million and reduces funding for the Department of the Interior Solicitor General by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase Indian Health Services by $4.4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Gosar.
